docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 20. -- Reaction against some recently favored theories and remedies was expressed in many of the papers read before sections of the American Medical Association today when the last sessions of the present convention were held.

headline.main: DIET 'FADS' SCORED AT MEDICAL SESSION; Mayo Clinic Physician Says the Sick Are Often "Stuffed" With Green Foods.

docs.abstract: F M Allen on myrtillin treatment, s before Amer Medical Assn
